body.p: 1. Grandson of Cush in the list of Noah’s descendants. His father was Raamah, and his brother’s name was Sheba (Gn 10:7; 1 Chr 1:9).
2. Grandson of Abraham through Keturah (Gn 25:3). His father was Jokshan, his brother was Sheba, and his descendants were the Asshurim, Letushim, and Leummim.
